Statute.Title: Budget Implementation Act, 2018, No. 2
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Exécution du budget de 2018, Loi no 2 d’)

Item.Text: — s. 247 (ss. 1 to 86) enacts the College of Patent Agents and Trade-mark Agents Act;
— s. 314 (ss. 1 to 5) enacts the Canadian Gender Budgeting Act;
— s. 416 (ss. 1 to 184) enacts the Pay Equity Act;
— s. 659 (ss. 1 to 8) enacts the International Financial Assistance Act;
— s. 661 (ss. 1 to 9) enacts the Department for Women and Gender Equality Act;
— s. 675 (ss. 1 to 8) enacts the Addition of Lands to Reserves and Reserve Creation Act;
— s. 684, repealing the Claim Settlements (Alberta and Saskatchewan) Implementation Act, 2002, c. 3 in force 27.08.2019 see SI/2019-92;
— s. 687 (ss. 1 and 2) enacts the Poverty Reduction Act;
— s. 2(1) deemed in force 24.10.2012 see s. 2(3);
— ss. 6(1) and 18(2) deemed in force 27.02.2018 see ss. 6(2) and 18(10);
— s. 11(1) deemed in force 01.01.2008 see s. 11(2)
— ss. 12(1) to (6) and 69 to 123 in force 01.01.2019 see ss. 12(7) and 126;

— ss. 17(1), (2), (7) and (10) deemed in force 29.06.2012 in respect of organizations, corporations and trusts that are registered charities on 14.09.2018 see par. 17(12)(a) and in respect of associations that are registered Canadian amateur athletic associations on that date; and on 14.09.2018 in any other case see par. 17(12)(b);

— ss. 17(3), (4), (6), (8) and (11) deemed in force 01.01.2008 in respect of organizations, corporations and trusts that are registered charities on 14.09.2018 see par. 17(13)(a) and on 14.09.2018 in any other case see par. 17(13)(b);

— s. 17(9) deemed in force 01.01.2012 in respect of associations that are registered Canadian amateur athletic associations on 14.09.2018 see par. 17(14)(a) and on 14.09.2018 in any other case see par. 17(14)(b);

— s. 20(1) deemed in force 29.06.2012 in respect of organizations, corporations and trusts that are registered charities on 14.09.2018 see par. 20(2)(a); and in respect of associations that are registered Canadian amateur athletic associations on that date; and on 14.09.2018 in any other case see par. 20(2)(b);
— the definition emission allowance, as enacted by s. 41(1), deemed in force 27.06.2018 see s. 41(2);
— the definition investment limited partnership, as enacted by s. 41(1), deemed in force 08.09.2017 see s. 41(3);
— s. 63(1) deemed in force 17.09.2018 see s. 63(2);
— ss. 182 to 185 in force 13.06.2019 (6 months after the month of the assent), see s. 186;
— s. 199 deemed in force 21.09.2017 see s. 213(2);
— ss. 1 to 171 and 174 to 184 of the Pay Equity Act, as enacted by s. 416, in force 31.08.2021 see SI/2021-36;
— ss. 172 and 173 of the Pay Equity Act, as enacted by s. 416, in force 31.08.2021, see SI/2021-36;

— s. 214 comes into force on the first day on which both s. 340 of the Economic Action Plan 2014 Act, No. 1 (17.06.2019) and s. 33 of the Combating Counterfeit Products Act (2014, c. 32) are in force or, if it is later, on the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 242(1) [Note: s. 33 repealed before coming into force see 2014, c. 20, s. 367];

— the definition Board in s. 2, ss. 11 to 20, 25 to 32, 34 to 62, 64 to 74 and par. 76(1)(c) to (f), (h) and (i) of the College of Patent Agents and Trade-mark Agents Act, as enacted by s. 247, in force 28.06.2021 see par. 264(a) and SI/2021-30;
— ss. 250(3) and 253 repealed before coming into force, see respectively 2018, c. 27, ss. 259(5) and 259(10);
— ss. 265 to 271 (Subdivision E of Division 7) in force 01.11.2019 see SI/2019-90;

— ss. 429, 430, 431(1) to (4) and 432 to 434 come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 440(3) — Not in force (Note: s. 432 initially repealed ss. 397 to 399 of the Budget Implementation Act, 2009; s. 399 of the Budget Implementation Act, 2009 repealed before coming into force see 2008, c. 20, s. 3 (Statutes Repeal Act) see also Canada Gazette, Part I, Vol. 159, No. 25, p. 1248

— s. 443 comes into force on the first day on which both s. 441 of this Act (01.09.2019) and s. 377 of the Budget Implementation Act, 2017, No. 1 (2017, c. 20) are in force see s. 534(2) — Not in force;

— ss. 451, 452, 461, 493, 498(1) to (3), 501, 518 and 520 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council but that day must not be earlier than the day on which both ss. 445 and 488 are in force, see s. 534(5) — Not in force;

— ss. 457(2), 460, 478 to 482, 484, 498(5), 505(3), and 521 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council but that day must not be earlier than the day on which both ss. 441 and 483 are in force see s. 534(6) — Not in force;
— ss. 511 to 516 in force on assent 13.12.2018;
— s. 517 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 534(4) — Not in force;

— ss. 518 and 520 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council but that day must not be earlier than the day on which both ss. 445 and 488 are in force see s. 534(5) — Not in force;

— s. 521 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council but that day must not be earlier than the day on which both ss. 441 and 483 are in force see s. 534(6) — Not in force;
— ss. 522, 523, 527 and 528 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see ss. 534(7), (8) and (10) — Not in force;

— ss. 535 to 624 (s. 624 repealed) in force 01.01.2021 (being the first day on which both s. 441 of this Act (01.09.2019) and s. 377 of the Budget Implementation Act, 2017, No. 1 (2017, c. 20) are in force (01.01.2021)) see s. 625;
— ss. 656 and 657 in force on 01.04.2022 see SI/2021-29
— ss. 654 and 655 and 658 come in force 23.06.2019 see SI/2019-49;
— s. 659 (ss. 1 to 8), enacting the International Financial Assistance Act, in force 23.06.2019 see SI/2019-45;
— s. 675 (ss. 1 to 8), enacting the Addition of Lands to Reserves and Reserve Creation Act, in force 27.08.2019 see SI/2019-92;
— ss. 676-683 (part of Division 19) in force 27.08.2019 see SI/2019-92;
— s. 684, repealing the Claim Settlements (Alberta and Saskatchewan Implementation Act) (2002, c. 3), in force 27.08.2019 see SI/2019-92;
